### databricks-cli and dbx

In order to develop locally ```databricks cli``` and via that ```dbx```, must be installed in order to connect to databricks clusters. 

Follow the steps in the documentation for installing the databricks cli. When its installed you can have full control over workspaces, repos, clusters, jobs etc from the terminal.

[databricks-cli](https://docs.databricks.com/dev-tools/cli/index.html)

Follow the steps in the documentation for installing ```dbx```.

[dbx](https://docs.databricks.com/dev-tools/dbx.html)
